records.name: Restored Heirloom
records.text: Water role only. Restricted. Interrupt: When you would resolve the [element-water] ring effect, choose a character you control – instead of resolving normal ring effects, put this attachment into play from your hand or conflict discard pile, attached to that character.

records.name: Ride Them Down
records.text: Action: During a conflict, discard the Imperial Favor – set the base strength of the attacked province to 1 until the end of the conflict. Errata from RRG v1.1

pack_cards.flavor: "We will bring the war to the Lion." – Moto Juro

records.name: Riot in the Streets
records.text: Action: During a conflict at this province, if you control 3 or more participating Bushi characters, choose a participating character – bow that character.

records.name: Rout
records.text: Action: During a conflict, choose an opponent's character with lower [conflict-military] skill than a participating Bushi character you control – move the chosen character home.

records.name: Roving Michibiku
records.text: Reaction: After this character wins a conflict – take a ring from the defending player’s claimed ring pool.

pack_cards.flavor: "The truth of the world can be found sitting at the riverside. The river never begins, the river never ends. All of life is like the river, lesson never begin and lessons never end." - Tao of Shinsei

records.name: Sabotage
records.text: Earth role only. Action: During a [conflict-military] conflict, choose a card in an opponent's province – discard that card.

records.name: Sacred Sanctuary
records.text: Reaction: After an attack is declared at this province, choose a Monk character you control – ready that character. Until the end of the conflict, that character cannot be bowed by opponents' card effects or as a result of conflict resolution.

records.name: Sadane Student
records.text: This character gets +2[conflict-political] while you have claimed the [element-air] or [element-fire] ring.

pack_cards.flavor: "How adorable that you would wear something your little brother made for you."

records.name: Sake House Confidant
records.text: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, discard the Imperial Favor – each Shinobi character you control gets +2[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "Would you like to concede?"

records.name: Sanpuku Seidō
records.text:
Cannot be a stronghold province.
While resolving a conflict at this province, characters count their glory instead of their [conflict-military] skill and [conflict-political] skill.

records.name: Sashimono
records.text: Attach to a Bushi character you control. Attached character does not bow as a result of conflict resolution during [conflict-military] conflicts.

records.name: Savvy Politician
records.text: Reaction: After this character is honored, choose a character – honor that character.

pack_cards.flavor: For each of her accomplishments, she deferred the praise to those around her, and in this manner their loyalty was secured.

records.name: Seal of the Crab
records.text: Attached character gains the [clan-crab] clan symbol and the Berserker trait.

pack_cards.flavor: In the name of Lord Hida Kisada, Defender of the Wall

records.name: Seal of the Crane
records.text: Attached character gains the [clan-crane] clan symbol and the Duelist trait.

pack_cards.flavor:
In the name of Her Elegance, Lady Doji Hotaru,
Trusted Left Hand of the Emperor,
Beautiful Mistriss of the Arts,
Skillfull Daimyō of the Doji, and
Indomitable Champion of the Crane Clan

records.name: Seal of the Dragon
records.text: Attached character gains the [clan-dragon] clan symbol and the Monk trait.

pack_cards.flavor:
In the name of Togashi Yokuni,
the Enlightened,
Master of the High House of Light, and
Champion of the Dragon Clan

records.name: Seal of the Lion
records.text: Attached character gains the [clan-lion] clan symbol and the Commander trait.

pack_cards.flavor:
In the name of His Excellency,
the Right Hand of the Emperor,
High General,
Champion of the Lion,andnDaimyō of the Akodo,Toturi, son of Daio,
son of Kozue, daughter of Yokutsune...

records.name: Seal of the Phoenix
records.text: Attached character gains the [clan-phoenix] clan symbol and the Scholar trait.

pack_cards.flavor:
In the name of Lady Shiba Tsukune,
the Soul of Shiba,
Protector of the Council,
Keeper of the Tao,
Daimyō of the Shiba, and
Champion of the Phoenix Clan

records.name: Seal of the Scorpion
records.text: Attached character gains the [clan-scorpion] clan symbol and the Shinobi trait.

pack_cards.flavor:
In the name of Lord Bayushi Shoju,
the Most Dutiful,
Master of Secrets,
among other titles known and unknown,
Daimyō of the Bayushi, and
Champion of the Scorpion Clan

records.name: Seal of the Unicorn
records.text: Attached character gains the [clan-unicorn] clan symbol and the Cavalry trait.

pack_cards.flavor:
In the name of Lady Shinjo Altansarnai,
Seeker of the Setting Sun,
Khan of Khans,
Mistress of the Five Winds,
Daimyō of the Shinjo, and
Champion of the Unicorn Clan

records.name: Secluded Shrine
records.text: Reaction: After the conflict phase begins, choose a ring – until the end of the phase, you are considered to have that ring in your claimed ring pool.

records.name: Secluded Temple
records.text: Reaction: After the conflict phase begins, each opponent who controls more characters than you must choose a character he or she controls with 1 or more fate on it – remove 1 fate from each chosen character.

records.name: Secret Cache
records.text: Reaction: After a conflict is declared against this province – search the top 5 cards of your conflict deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle.

records.name: Seeker Initiate
records.text: Seeker role only. Reaction: After you claim a ring that matches the element of your role – search the top 5 cards of your conflict deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle.

records.name: Seeker of Air
records.text: You may replace 1 province of any element with an additional [element-air] province while deckbuilding. Reaction: After an [element-air] province you control is revealed – gain 1 fate.

records.name: Seeker of Earth
records.text: You may replace 1 province of any element with an additional [element-earth] province while deckbuilding. Reaction: After an [element-earth] province you control is revealed – gain 1 fate.

records.name: Seeker of Enlightenment
records.text: This character gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political] for each fate on each unclaimed ring.

pack_cards.flavor: “What is not wisdom?”

records.name: Seeker of Fire
records.text: You may replace 1 province of any element with an additional [element-fire] province while deckbuilding. Reaction: After a [element-fire] province you control is revealed – gain 1 fate.

records.name: Seeker of Knowledge
records.text: While this character is attacking, the contested ring gains the [element-air] element. If this character wins the conflict as an attacker, you may choose which of its ring effects to resolve.

records.name: Seeker of Void
records.text: You may replace 1 province of any element with an additional [element-void] province while deckbuilding. Reaction: After a [element-void] province you control is revealed – gain 1 fate.

records.name: Seeker of Water
records.text: You may replace 1 province of any element with an additional [element-water] province while deckbuilding. Reaction: After a [element-water] province you control is revealed – gain 1 fate.

records.name: Seeking the Truth
records.text: This province gets +2 strength while you have a Water role. Interrupt: When this province is broken, choose a defending character – move that character home.

records.name: Seppun Guardsman
records.text: This character cannot participate in conflicts as an attacker against a player that controls the Imperial Favor.

pack_cards.flavor: "Our cousins, the Otomo, secure the Empire. We secure the Emperor."

records.name: Seppun Ishikawa
records.text: This character gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political] for each other Imperial card you control.

pack_cards.flavor: "You are not worthy of her, Toturi-sama."
The real battle is fought against one's self.

records.name: Shameful Display
records.text: Action: During a conflict at this province, choose 2 participating characters – honor one of those characters and dishonor the other.

records.name: Shiba Peacemaker
records.text: This character cannot participate in conflicts as an attacker.

pack_cards.flavor: A lifetime of peace is worth a moment of war.

records.name: Shiba Tetsu
records.text: Reaction: After you play a Spell card during a conflict – until the end of the conflict, this character gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political]. (Unlimited.)

pack_cards.flavor: All that matters is that I server my clan as best I am able.

records.name: Shiba Tsukune
records.text: Interrupt: When the conflict phase ends – resolve the ring effects of up to 2 unclaimed rings as if you were the attacking player.

pack_cards.flavor: "I will do my best."

records.name: Shiba Yōjimbō
records.text: Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered ability that targets a Shugenja you control would initiate – cancel those effects.

records.name: Shiksha Scout
records.text: While this character is participating in a conflict, you are considered to control an additional character in this conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "We have seen much that is strange from the world. That our allies might be called strange is merely a compliment." - Shinjo Altansarnai

records.name: Shinjo Altansarnai
records.text: Reaction: After you break a province during a [conflict-military] conflict in which this character is participating, your opponent chooses a character he or she controls – discard that character.

pack_cards.flavor: "This steed will not be broken to rein and saddle, nor will I compromise my clan in the name of peace."
pack_cards.illustrator: Shawn Ignatius Tan and Le Vuong

records.name: Shinjo Outrider
records.text: Action: During a conflict – move this character to the conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "I'm on my way."

records.name: Shinjo Saddle
records.text: Cavalry character only. Action: Choose a Cavalry character you control – attach this card to that character.

pack_cards.flavor: Among the Unicorn, one inherits more than just a daishō.

records.name: Shinjo Scout
records.text: Reaction: After you gain fate for passing in the dynasty phase – gain 1 fate.

pack_cards.flavor: "The Scorpion have eyes in every court. We have eyes everywhere else."

records.name: Shinjo Shono
records.text: Pride. Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, if you control more participating characters than your opponent – each participating Cavalry character you control gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Shinjo Tatsuo
records.text: Action: During a conflict, choose this character and up to 1 other character you control – move those characters to the conflict.

records.name: Shiotome Encampment
records.text: Action: If you have a [conflict-military] ring in your claimed ring pool, choose a Cavalry character – ready that character.

pack_cards.flavor: "We need not mar the purity of our intentions with mere words."

records.name: Shiro Nishiyama
records.text: Action: During a conflict, bow this stronghold – each defending character you control gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Shizuka Toshi
records.text: Action: During a [conflict-political] conflict, bow this stronghold. Choose a participating character with [conflict-political] skill 2 or lower – bow that character.

records.name: Shosuro Actress
records.text: Action: During a conflict, sacrifice this character. Choose a non-Shinobi character with printed cost 3 or lower in an opponent's discard pile – put that character into play in the conflict under your control.

records.name: Shosuro Miyako
records.text: Reaction: After you play a character from your hand, your opponent must select one – discard 1 card at random from his or her hand or choose and dishonor a character he or she controls.

records.name: Shosuro Sadako
records.text: While this character is dishonored, add its glory to its [conflict-military] and [conflict-political] instead of substracting it.

records.name: Shrewd Yasuki
records.text: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, if there is a holding in play – look at the top 2 cards of your conflict deck. Add 1 of those cards to your hand and place the other on the bottom of your conflict deck.

records.name: Shrine Maiden
records.text: Reaction: After this character enters play, reveal the top 3 cards of your conflict deck – add each Spell and each Kihō card revealed by this ability to your hand and discard the rest.

pack_cards.flavor: "My family has protected this shrine for generations, and we shall protect it for generations more."

records.name: Silver-Tongued Magistrate
records.text: While this character is attacking, each other character that has no fate on it does not count its skill toward the resolution of this conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "A beautiful Empire can only be built upon beautiful laws."

records.name: Sinister Soshi
records.text: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating character – that character gets –2[conflict-military] and –2[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Smoke and Mirrors
records.text: Action: During a conflict, choose any number of attacking Shinobi characters you control – move each chosen character home.

pack_cards.flavor: "What was that!?"

records.name: Smoke
records.text: Action: While attached character is participating in a conflict, bow and sacrifice this attachment – until the end of the conflict, each non-unique participating character gets -2[conflict-military].

records.name: Sneaky Shinjo
records.text: Reaction: After you pass in the dynasty phase – play this character from your province.

pack_cards.flavor: "Conceal yourself like the desert viper within the dunes."

records.name: Solemn Scholar
records.text: Action: During a conflict, if the [element-earth] ring is in your claimed ring pool, choose an attacking character – bow that character.

records.name: Soshi Illusionist
records.text: Action: Spend 1 fate, choose a character – discard a status token from that character.

pack_cards.flavor: "People see only what they hope to see."

records.name: Soshi Shadowshaper
records.text: Action: During the conflict phase, lose 1 honor. Choose a character with cost 2 or lower that has entered play from a player's hand this phase – return that character to its owner's hand.

records.name: Soshi Shiori
records.text: Reaction: After you win a conflict, choose a player – that player loses 1 honor. (Unlimited.)

pack_cards.flavor: "The clans cannot strike at what they cannot perceive."

records.name: Soul Beyond Reproach
records.text: Air role only. Action: Choose a character you control – honor that character. Then, honor it again.

records.name: Specialized Defenses
records.text: Earth role only. Action: During a conflict, if the attacked province has an element that matches the contested ring or a ring in your claimed ring pool – double that province’s strength until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Spies at Court
records.text: Reaction: After you win a [conflict-political] conflict, dishonor a (friendly) participating character – discard 2 cards at random from your opponent's hand. (Max 1 per conflict.)

records.name: Spreading the Darkness
records.text: Action: Lose 2 honor. Choose a participating character you control – until the end of the conflict, that character gets +4[conflict-military] and cannot be targeted by opponents' card abilities.

pack_cards.flavor: "Feast, kansen, upon this offering."

records.name: Spyglass
records.text: Reaction: After attached character commits to a conflict or moves to a conflict – draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)

records.name: Staging Ground
records.text: Action: Choose up to 2 facedown cards in your provinces – turn the chosen cards faceup.

records.name: Stand Your Ground
records.text: Interrupt: When an honored character you control would leave play – instead discard that character's status token.

records.name: Staunch Hida
records.text: Reaction: After this character wins a conflict as a defender – resolve the ring effect of that conflict as if you were the attacking player. (Max 1 per conflict)

records.name: Steadfast Samurai
records.text: Forced Reaction: After the fate phase begins, if you have at least 5 more honor than an opponent – this character cannot be discarded or lose fate this phase.

records.name: Steadfast Witch Hunter
records.text: Action: Sacrifice a (friendly) character. Choose a character – ready that character.

pack_cards.flavor: "The Shadowlands Taint can poison any soul. It is my duty to cleanse it from our ranks."

records.name: Steward of Law
records.text: While this character is participating in a conflict, characters cannot become dishonored.

pack_cards.flavor: "There is no better armor than the edicts of Hantei-no-Kami."

records.name: Stoic Gunsō
records.text: Action: During a conflict, sacrifice a (friendly) character – this character gets +3[conflict-military] until the end of the conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "We are the Wall."

records.name: Stoic Magistrate
records.text: While this character is defending, each character with printed cost 2 or lower does not count its skill toward the resolution of this conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "There is no justice. There is just us."

records.name: Stolen Breath
records.text:
This attachment cannot be played during a conflict.
Attached character cannot participate in [conflict-political] conflicts.

pack_cards.illustrator: "You truly have nothing to say on the matter?"

records.name: Strength in Numbers
records.text: Action: While you are the attacking player, choose a defending character with glory X or lower – move that character home. X is equal to the number of attacking characters.

records.name: Supernatural Storm
records.text: Action: Choose a participating character – that character gets +X[conflict-military] and +X[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict. X is equal to the number of Shugenja characters you control.

records.name: Support of the Phoenix
records.text: Increase your deckbuilding influence value by 8. You may only spend influence on [clan-phoenix] clan cards.

records.name: Swift Magistrate
records.text: While this character is attacking, each other character that has 1 or more fate on it does not count its skill toward the resolution of this conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "It is our duty to temper the law with compassion."

records.name: Tactician's Apprentice
records.text: Reaction: After honor dials are revealed, if your bid is lower than an opponent's – draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

records.name: Tainted Hero
records.text: This character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender. Action: Sacrifice a {friendly) character – until the end of the phase, treat this character's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

records.name: Tainted Koku
records.text: Interrupt: When attached character leaves play – move this attachment to another character controlled by the same player.

pack_cards.flavor: "Some say greed is an illness. They don't know how right they are." – Ikoma Ikehata

records.name: Talisman of the Sun
records.text: Keeper role only. Action: During a conflict in which you are the defending player, bow this attachment – move the contested ring to another eligible province and reveal it, if able. That province is now the attacked province.

records.name: Taryu-Jiai
records.text: Action: During a conflict, choose a Shugenja character you control and a Shugenja character controlled by an opponent – your character challenges your opponent’s character to a glory duel. The winner of the duel‘s controller resolves a ring effect of his or her choice as if he or she was the attacking player.

records.name: Tattered Missive
records.text: Attach to a Courtier character you control. Action: Bow attached character – search the top 5 cards of your conflict deck for a card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle.

records.name: Tattooed Wanderer
records.text: You may play this character as an attachment with the text: "Attached character gains covert."

pack_cards.flavor: It is said that Dragon shugenja and courtiers are warriors, their warriors are monks, and their monks are inexplicable.

records.name: Teachings of the Elements
records.text: This province gets +1 strength for each claimed ring.

pack_cards.flavor: "You cannot balance the elements when you are without balance." – Tao of Shinsei

records.name: Tears of Amaterasu
records.text: Keeper role only. Reaction: After this province is revealed – gain 1 fate for each attacking character.

records.name: Tengu Sensei
records.text: Covert. Reaction: After this character chooses a character using covert – that character cannot be declared as an attacker this phase.

records.name: Test of Courage
records.text: Action: During a conflict, if your honor bid is lower than your opponent's, choose a [clan-lion] character you control – move that character to the conflict. Then, honor it.

records.name: Test of Skill
records.text: Seeker role only. Action: Name a card type. Reveal the top 3 cards of your conflict deck (top 4 cards instead if you control a Duelist character) – add up to 2 revealed cards of that type to your hand and discard the rest.

records.name: The Art of Peace
records.text: Interrupt: When this province is broken – dishonor each attacking character and honor each defending character.

pack_cards.flavor: "One does not always need to kill to be victorious." - Kakita's The Sword

records.name: The Art of War
records.text: Interrupt: When this province is broken – draw 3 cards.

pack_cards.flavor: "Let your enemy see what he wishes to see, so that he will underestimate you." - Akodo's Leadership

records.name: The Imperial Palace
records.text:
Limit 1 per deck.
This holding adds +3 to your side during each glory count.

records.name: The Mirror's Gaze
records.text: Attach to a Shugenja character you control. Reaction: After the effects of an opponent's event resolve – resolve that event again as if you had just played it, ignoring costs and triggering conditions. You may choose new targets.

records.name: The Mountain Does Not Fall
records.text: Action: Choose a character – until the end of the phase, that character does not bow as a result of conflict resolution while defending. (Max 1 per round.)

records.name: The Path of Man
records.text: Reaction: After you win a conflict by 5 or more skill – gain 2 fate.

pack_cards.flavor:
"It is the nature of man to walk the path. It is the nature of man to turn from the path. This is the nature of man."
- Shinsei's Gift, apocryphal

records.name: The Perfect Gift
records.text: Action: Reveal the top 4 cards of each player's conflict deck. Choose 1 revealed card owned by each player and add it to its owner's hand. Shuffle.

pack_cards.flavor: He had refused twice, but could not bring himself to refuse a third time.

records.name: The Stone of Sorrows
records.text: Seeker role only. While attached character is ready, opponents cannot remove or gain fate from rings.

pack_cards.flavor: There is no sorrow greater than wisdom.

records.name: The Wrath of the Kami
records.text: Limit 1 per deck. Action: During a conflict at this province, lose 1 honor – this province gets +1 strength until the end of the conflict. (Unlimited.)

records.name: Third Tower Guard
records.text: This character gets +2[conflict-military] while you have claimed the [element-earth] or [element-water] ring.

pack_cards.flavor: "Swords will break and spears will shatter, but our courage shall never falter."

records.name: Time for War
records.text: Seeker role only. Reaction: After you lose a [conflict-political] conflict, choose a Bushi character you control – put a Weapon attachment with printed cost 3 or lower into play from your hand or conflict discard pile, attached to that character.

records.name: Tireless Sōdan Senzo
records.text: This character does not bow as a result of conflict resolution in conflicts in which it lost.

pack_cards.flavor: "The spirits cannot rest, so why should I?"

records.name: Togashi Initiate
records.text: Action: While this character is attacking, spend 1 fate to an unclaimed ring – honor this character.

pack_cards.flavor: "What is wisdom?"

records.name: Togashi Kazue
records.text: You may play this character as an attachment with the text: "Action: During a conflict in which attached character is participating, choose another participating character – move 1 fate from that character to the attached character."

records.name: Togashi Mendicant
records.text: Reaction: After the fate phase begins – look at the top 3 cards of your dynasty deck. Then, put them back in any order.

pack_cards.flavor: "It was but a little I spent to save the kit, but had it cost a Fortune I would not have grudged it."

records.name: Togashi Mitsu
records.text: Covert. Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, choose a Monk, Tattoo, or Kihō card in your conflict discard pile – play that card as if it were in your hand. If it is an event, put it on the bottom of your conflict deck instead of into your discard pile after resolving its effects.

records.name: Togashi Tadakatsu
records.text: The defending player chooses the element (but not the type) during each conflict declared against him or her. This choice is made before conflict type, attacking characters, and the attacked province are chosen.

pack_cards.flavor: The ant and the beetle are equal beneath the sun. The beetle and the ant are equal beneath the moon.

records.name: Togashi Yokuni
records.text: Action: Choose a triggered ability printed on another character – this character gains that ability until the end of the phase. (Max 1 per round.)

pack_cards.flavor: "What transpires in our mountains is a mere pebble against the avalanche that is coming."
pack_cards.illustrator: Shawn Ignatius Tan and Le Vuong

records.name: Tranquility
records.text: Action: During a conflict – until the end of the conflict, characters in your opponent's home cannot trigger abilities.

pack_cards.flavor: You have entered a state in which nothing can harm you.

records.name: Unassuming Yōjimbō
records.text: Covert. (When this character attacks, choose one character without covert. That character cannot be declared as a defender.)

records.name: Unleash the Djinn
records.text: Fire role only. Action: During a conflict, lose 3 honor – set the [conflict-military] and [conflict-political] skill of each participating character to 3 until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Upholding Authority
records.text: This province gets +2 strength while you have an Earth role. Interrupt: When this province is broken – the attacking player reveals his or her hand. Choose a card in their hand and discard any number of copies of that card from their hand.

records.name: Utaku Infantry
records.text: While this character is participating in a conflict, it gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political] for each participating [clan-unicorn] character you control.

records.name: Utaku Mediator
records.text: This character gets +1 [conflict-military] and +1 [conflict-political] while you do not have the Imperial Favor.

pack_cards.flavor: "It is difficult to speak clearly to those who have seen so little of the world."

records.name: Utaku Yumino
records.text: Action: During a conflict, discard a card from your hand – this character gets +2[conflict-military] and +2[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict. (Limit once per conflict.)

records.name: Vanguard Warrior
records.text: Action: Sacrifice this character. Choose a character – place 1 fate on that character.

pack_cards.flavor: "You will have the time you need. Use it wisely."

records.name: Venerable Historian
records.text: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, if you are more honorable than your opponent – honor this character.

pack_cards.flavor: "Only by looking to the past can we hope to conquer the future."

records.name: Vengeful Berserker
records.text: Reaction: After another character you control leaves play during a conflict – double this character's [conflict-military] skill until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Vengeful Oathkeeper
records.text: Reaction: After you lose a [conflict-military] conflict – put this character into play from your hand.

pack_cards.flavor: "When a samurai has said he will perform an action, it is as good as done." - Akodo's Leadership

records.name: Voice of Honor
records.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an event would initiate, if you control more honored characters than an opponent – cancel those effects.

records.name: Void Fist
records.text: Action: During a conflict, if you have played at least 2 other cards this conflict, choose a participating character with equal or lower [conflict-military] skill than a participating Monk character you control – move the chosen character home and bow it.

records.name: Volcanic Troll
records.text: No attachments except Weapon. While the [element-fire] ring is unclaimed, this character gets +2[conflict-military] and +2[conflict-political].

records.name: Walking the Way
records.text: If you control a Shugenja character, reduce the cost to play this card by 1. Action: Look at the top 3 cards of your dynasty deck. Discard a card from a province you control, and put one of the looked at cards into that province faceup. Shuffle.

records.name: Wandering Ronin
records.text: Action: During a conflict, remove 1 fate from this character – it gets +2[conflict-military] and +2[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict. (Limit twice per conflict.)

records.name: Waning Hostilities
records.text: Reaction: After the conflict phase begins – each player has only one opportunity to declare a conflict this phase.

pack_cards.flavor: "Knowing your advantages does you no good if your enemy is able to keep you from employing them." – Tao of Shinsei

records.name: War Dog Master
records.text: Reaction: After this character is declared as an attacker, discard the top card of your dynasty deck – this character gets +X[conflict-military] until the end of the conflict. X is the printed cost of the discarded card.

pack_cards.flavor: "If samurai were as loyal as dogs, there would be no need for Bushidō."

records.name: Warrior Poet
records.text: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict – each participating character controlled by your opponent gets –1[conflict-military] and –1[conflict-political] until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Watch Commander
records.text: Attach to a character you control. Limit 1 per character. Reaction: After an opponent plays a card during a conflict in which attached character is participating – that player loses 1 honor. (Unlimited.)

records.name: Way of the Chrysanthemum
records.text: Reaction: After 1 or more honor is given to you from an honor bid – gain that much honor. (Max 1 per round.)

pack_cards.flavor: As Lady Sun's brilliance illuminates the land, so too does her chosen son radiate peace and prosperity to all Rokugan.

records.name: Way of the Crab
records.text: Action: Sacrifice a (friendly) [clan-crab] character. Choose an opponent – that player must sacrifice a character. (Max 1 per round.)

pack_cards.flavor: Courage. Duty. Sacrifice.

records.name: Way of the Crane
records.text: Action: Choose a [clan-crane] character you control – honor that character.

pack_cards.flavor: There is a proper technique for all things.

records.name: Way of the Dragon
records.text:
Attach to a character you control. Limit 1 per character.
You may trigger each of attached character's triggered abilities an additional time each round (or specified period).

pack_cards.flavor: Find your own path.

records.name: Way of the Lion
records.text: Action: During a conflict, choose a [clan-lion] character – double that character's base [conflict-military] skill until the end of the conflict.

pack_cards.flavor: "War is the most noble pursuit of a samurai. It gives him purpose and brings honor to his ancestors." - Akodo's Leadership

records.name: Way of the Phoenix
records.text: Action: Choose a ring and an opponent – that player cannot declare conflicts of that ring's element this phase. (Max 1 per phase.)

pack_cards.flavor: Master the elements and be reborn.

records.name: Way of the Scorpion
records.text: Action: During a conflict, choose a participating non-[clan-scorpion] character – dishonor that character.

pack_cards.flavor: To combat the liars, the thieves, and the traitors within the Great Clans, Bayushi's followers would have to lie, steal, and cheat in turn.

records.name: Way of the Unicorn
records.text: Interrupt: When you would pass the first player token – keep it instead.

pack_cards.flavor: One cannot capture the wind.

records.name: Web of Lies
records.text: X is equal to twice the bid on your honor dial.

pack_cards.flavor: "You're sure this is no the home of Bayushi Shuzo?"

records.name: Wholeness of the World
records.text: Interrupt: When a ring in your claimed ring pool would be returned to the unclaimed ring pool – it remains claimed instead. (Max 1 per round.)

pack_cards.flavor: "The Master understands that the universe is out of his control. Because he accepts himself, the whole word accepts him." - Tao of Shinsei

records.name: Wicked Tetsubō
records.text: Attach to a Berserker character. Restricted. Action: During a conflict in which attached character is attacking, choose a defending character and select either [conflict-military] or [conflict-political] – set that character's selected skill to 0 until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Winds of Change
records.text: Air role only. Action: Return the [element-air] ring from a claimed ring pool to the unclaimed ring pool.

pack_cards.flavor: "You cannot take back your words any more than you can bottle the evening breeze."

records.name: Windswept Yurt
records.text: Action: Sacrifice this holding, select one – each player gains 2 fate or each player gains 2 honor. Refill this province faceup.

pack_cards.flavor: "After a week in the saddle, it felt like the Imperial Palace." - Shinjo Yasamura

records.name: Writ of Authority
records.text: Earth role only. Restricted. If an opponent is more honorable than you, discard this attachment.

records.name: Written in the Stars
records.text: Action: Select one – place 1 fate on each unclaimed ring with no fate or remove 1 fate from each unclaimed ring.

pack_cards.flavor: "The time has come." – Togashi Mitsu

records.name: Yasuki Broker
records.text: While this character is participating in a conflict, each character you control gains courtesy and sincerity.

pack_cards.flavor: "We must make do with what little the Empire can spare."

records.name: Yasuki Taka
records.text: Reaction: After a [clan-crab] character leaves play during the conflict phase – gain 1 fate. (Unlimited.)

pack_cards.flavor: "I find the best use of my mouth is to bargain with it."

records.name: Yogo Hiroue
records.text: Action: While this character is participating in a conflict, choose a non-participating character – move that character to this conflict. Then, if you win the conflict, you may dishonor that character.

records.name: Yogo Kikuyo
records.text: Interrupt: When the effects of a Spell event your opponent plays during a conflict would initiate, put this character into play from your hand – cancel those effects. Errata from RRG v1.3

pack_cards.flavor: "Not on my watch."

records.name: Yogo Outcast
records.text: This character gets +1[conflict-military] and +1[conflict-political] while you are less honorable than an opponent.

pack_cards.flavor: Long ago, the Dark Kami himself cursed those carrying the Yogo bloodline to inevitably betray the one they love most.

records.name: Yōjin no Shiro
records.text: Action: During a conflict, bow this stronghold – each attacking character you control gets +1[conflict-military] until the end of the conflict.

records.name: Yoritomo
records.text: This character gets +X[conflict-military] and +X[conflict-political]. X is equal to the number of fate in your fate pool.

pack_cards.flavor: "Simply saying it does not make it so."

records.name: Young Harrier
records.text: Action: Dishonor this character – each [clan-crane] character you control cannot be dishonored until the end of the phase.

pack_cards.flavor: To do what we must.

records.name: Young Rumormonger
records.text: Interrupt: When a character would be honored or dishonored, choose another character controlled by the same player – that character receives the honor or dishonor instead.
